job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: strongWhats the opportunitybrbrstrongWorkRamp is growing steadily in a large well defined SAAS market We are currently looking for engineers that will help architect and lay the foundation for the company for the next few years At WorkRamp we strive for engineering excellence Our team is collaborative and impact focused and we hold each other to a high quality standard with code review Engineers own projects end to end You will work closely with our customer and design teams to identify the customer pain point architect a wellcrafted solution and deploy at scalebrbrstrongWhat will I be doingbrbrstrongstronguOur Tech Stack Consists OfbrustrongulliRuby on Rails backendliliReact and MobX on the frontendliliPostgresliliDeployed on AWSbrliulstronguProjects You Might Work OnbrustrongulliRearchitect certain parts of the codebase to be more eventdriven evaluate different queueing systems make sure queued actions are idempotent etcliliA reportinganalytics engine to surface all the training metrics generated by our system Have the ability to filter by many different dimensions Figure out the data storagecaching mechanism to make queries performantliliSet up continuous testing pipeline Build up test suite and make sure it runs in a reasonable amount of time Integrate testing with our code review tool phabricatorliliImplement a new UI design on some of our most critical pages Make sure the UX makes sense and the page loads quicklyliliArchitecting developing and deploying new features for our core SAAS product in a full stack capacitybrliul strongWhat skills do I needbrstrongulliStrong desire to work at an earlystage startuplili14 years of industryexperience building product quality softwareliliExpert timemanagement and prioritization within a fastpaced environmentliliEffective at collaborating with crossfunctional teamsbrliulThe salary range for this position is 120000  200000brbr
